short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cobalt Sequence Recorder is a browser extension that lets you record your actions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can use the Cobalt Sequence Recorder to save and export a login or navigation sequence to be replayed during scans.

To record a sequence, you need to:

Download the Cobalt extension by clicking on "Add to Chrome".
Click on the Cobalt icon in the address bar to open the plugin, type your target URL, and click "Start recording".
Access your target and make sure to perform every step necessary for the sequence to work as intended.
Copy or download the recorded sequence.
Paste or upload the sequence to your target settings on Cobalt.
Once these steps are completed, you can start a scan.
